Correlation-based clustering into compact blocks

Source: R/zzz_monitors_helpers.R
dot-sop_split_into_blocks.Rd

Correlation-based clustering into compact blocks

Usage

.sop_split_into_blocks(M, max_block = 40L, min_corr = 0.2)

Arguments

M

Numeric matrix with columns = variables.

max_block

Max block size.

min_corr

(Reserved) minimal correlation target (not enforced yet).

Value

List of character vectors (column names per block).
